name: Santosh Export
overview:
We’re a specialized Promotional Products & Gifts Company that blends creativity, technology and committed professionals into an organization that supports the branding and marketing initiatives of our clients. We provide our clients with unique business solutions that further brand loyalty with their clients, prospects and employees.

Infrastructural Facilities: We are backed by a modern infrastructural facility that is equipped with technologically advanced tools and machines that enable us to fabricate high quality products. Our infrastructural unit is spread over a wide area of land to fulfill the bulk orders of clients within the promised time schedule.

Our Vendor Base: In order to supply our clients a wide range of superior quality promotional items, we have formed strong business relations with eminent vendors of the industry. These vendors are selected with the help of our sourcing agents with an extensive market research.

Our Quality Assurance: Being a quality conscious organization, quality is considered as the main objective of our company. Directed with the dedicated efforts of our experienced professionals, global quality standards are maintained in the offered product range.

Why Promotional Products?: Consumer promotions is one of the best ways to attract consumers to a New Product or create awareness about an existing Product or Increase Sales by attracting consumers to the Product.

Client Satisfaction: As a client conscious organization, we strive hard to provide customers’ maximum level of contentment. Our experienced professionals work in close-harmonization with the customers to offer, what exactly they need.

our products: Promotional PVC Keychains Promotional Bar Accessories Promotional Medals & Medallions Gifts & Premiums POP Display Stands Promotional Tin Cans Neck Lanyards Promotional Toys
